attribs.name: attacks_macro_var
attribs.current: [Maul (Normal)](~repeating_attack_-klrzopbjy22dgphwuwk_attack), [Maul (Raging)](~repeating_attack_-klrzvs2klpcjysvwwvf_attack), [Great Weapon Master Maul (Normal)](~repeating_attack_-klrzxts1ho1rhm11rwn_attack), [Great Weapon Master Maul (Raging)](~repeating_attack_-klrzb7mrtyd87kik5fg_attack)

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQgbpWbpe6BEigC_freetext
attribs.current: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQgbpWbpe6BEigC_display_text
attribs.current: You can attack twice, instead of once, whenever you take the Attack action on your turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQiHv3FnblFUQym_freetext
attribs.current:
On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action. While raging, you gain the following benefits if you aren't wearing heavy armor:
•You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
•When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you add 2 to that damage roll.
•You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
If you are able to cast spells, you can't cast them or concentrate on them while raging.
Your rage lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are knocked unconscious or if your turn ends and you haven't attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage since then. You can also end your rage on your turn as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQiHv3FnblFUQym_display_text
attribs.current:
On your turn, you can enter a rage as a bonus action. While raging, you gain the following benefits if you aren't wearing heavy armor:
•You have advantage on Strength checks and Strength saving throws.
•When you make a melee weapon attack using Strength, you add 2 to that damage roll.
•You have resistance to bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage
If you are able to cast spells, you can't cast them or concentrate on them while raging.
Your rage lasts for 1 minute. It ends early if you are knocked unconscious or if your turn ends and you haven't attacked a hostile creature since your last turn or taken damage since then. You can also end your rage on your turn as a bonus action.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQlt9rPAbmtHNcZ_freetext
attribs.current: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQlt9rPAbmtHNcZ_display_text
attribs.current: While you are not wearing any armor, your Armor Class equals 10 + your Dexterity modifier + your Constitution modifier. You can use a shield and still gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQmtAYUa6sGCIyA_freetext
attribs.current: When you make your first attack on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Strength during this turn, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQmtAYUa6sGCIyA_display_text
attribs.current: When you make your first attack on your turn, you can decide to attack recklessly. Doing so gives you advantage on melee weapon attack rolls using Strength during this turn, but attack rolls against you have advantage until your next turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQoD5ZnQqIGKx0g_freetext
attribs.current: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that you can see, such as traps and spells. To gain this benefit, you can't be blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQoD5ZnQqIGKx0g_display_text
attribs.current: You have advantage on Dexterity saving throws against effects that you can see, such as traps and spells. To gain this benefit, you can't be blinded, deafened, or incapacitated.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQqnfab4AiKMECs_freetext
attribs.current: Your speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQqnfab4AiKMECs_display_text
attribs.current: Your speed increases by 10 feet while you aren't wearing heavy armor.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQr3rv0yJHj0dno_freetext
attribs.current:
Your instincts are so honed that you have advantage on initiative rolls.
Additionally, if you are surprised at the beginning of combat and aren't incapacitated, you can act normally on your first turn, but only if you enter your rage before doing anything else on that turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRueQr3rv0yJHj0dno_display_text
attribs.current:
Your instincts are so honed that you have advantage on initiative rolls.
Additionally, if you are surprised at the beginning of combat and aren't incapacitated, you can act normally on your first turn, but only if you enter your rage before doing anything else on that turn.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLRyLW4UdqGcYDleEVK_display_text
attribs.current: You can go into a frenzy when you rage. If you do so, for the duration of your rage you can make a single melee weapon attack as a bonus action on each of your turns after this one.

attribs.name: proficiencies
attribs.current:
Light & Medium Armors, All weapons, shields
Drums

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLS-otcqqI2apL9Bmug_display_text
attribs.current:
You have an excellent memory for maps and geography, and you can always recall the general layout of terrain, settlements, and other features around you.
In addition, you can find food and fresh water for yourself and up to five other people each day, provided that the land offers berries, small game, water, and so forth.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLS03WWegnM-awTZlCv_display_text
attribs.current: You can focus yourself to occasionally shrug off injury. When you take damage, you can use your reaction to roll a d12. Add your Constitution modifier to the number rolled, and  reduce the damage by that total. After you use this trait, you can’t use it again until you finish a short or long rest.

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLS0burQO-mZiwTj08D_display_text
attribs.current: You count as one size larger when determining your carrying capacity and the weight you can push, drag or lift

attribs.name: repeating_trait_-KLS0qAvt0wTdSv-saHz_display_text
attribs.current: You're acclimated to high altitude including elevations above 20.000 feet. You're also naturally adapted to cold climates, as described in the chapter 5 of the Dungeon Master's Guide
